item.title: A note for when pip3 has been installed with python2.7 for some reason
item.description: I want to install a package using pip3 for python3, but for some reason, the python version of pip3 is python2.7 and I get an error that the package cannot be installed by python3. ~:python3 -V Python 3.7.4 ~/program/scrape: pip3 -V pip 20.0.2 from /Users/eijikudo/Library/Python/2.7/lib/python/site-packages/pip (python 2.7) python3.7 -m pip install package name It was done after specifying the python version and installing. You can do this. .. ..
